title: Santa Paws, Our Hero
description: Everyone's favorite canine hero, Santa Paws, is back in this fifth book in the series. Santa Paws's past rescues have made him quite a celebrity -- but he must prove himself in a new challenge.Santa Paws has hit it big! Now that it's Christmastime again, he's been asked to do appearances at malls, shopping centers, and children's hospitals all throughout New England. But when disaster strikes, Santa Paws is there to save the day.
author: Nicholas Edwards
